summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5682 for the improvement of Willow Street, from Rainier Avenue to 46th Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75132, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
